rules.description: shift+cmd+l types javascript: and hits enter hack
Hold cmd+v for KM clipboard history

to_if_held_down.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "Activate Clipboard History Switcher"'
